eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.quests

Class WauzQuest

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.system.quests.WauzQuest

  • public class WauzQuest
extends java.lang.Object
    A quest, generated from a quest config file.
    Author:
    Wauzmons
